name: Grelas The Manx
description:
Dr. Plataduck is up to no good as he constantly opening portal from one world to another. Join Grelas on his adventure to thwart the Dr. Plataduck's evil plan and his eight evil cronies from taking over the world, and bring peace to the world. 

The keyboard controls are

Z is A: Attack.

X is B: Jump

S is X: Change weapons

A is Y: Menu

Up and right arrows to move character around.
